text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump I understand you have to post stuff. That’s your job. You mean to say 2.5 million people went back to their jobs that were lost to the GOP ‘s handling of Covid19. If thats your positive... so be it. Still... kids in cages, people dying of Covid19. Now let’s talk about Bountigate.
